name: Question 1
description: The evil organization zarthrusa has set a course ridden with traps for you, intepid explorer. Find the best ways to beat the obstacles in front of you to save the little prince

questions.title: multiverse rescue
questions.description: The image below is an ancient riddle that you find. It gurantees you eternal power. Solve it.
questions.answer: Use the left lever to count the visits and have the right lever have no meaning. Only I get to reset and if you have pushed it once then use the right lever instead.
questions.hint: This is a video on Ted-ED. You can watch the video and solve this questions

questions.title: Defeat the evil wizard
questions.description: You are sent into a magical dimension and you hear the following voice give you instructions. Follow them and defeat the wizard. Here is the heavenly voice: https://paste.c-net.org/ScudderMemory
questions.answer: It is there in the audio itself.
